name: External Link Redirection
author: Ashraf

sections.description:
The plugin is easy to use and it has a simple, user-friendly interface.
It is also highly configurable, so you can customize it to meet your specific needs.
The WordPress External Link Redirection plugin is free.
It can help you triple your income from your ads by showing people more ads when they visit external links inside your articles or pages
sections.faq:
How can this plugin help me increase my ad revenue?

You will have options to place your ad code inside the plugin settings and select a page, people who click on any external link on an article inside your website, will not leave your website, instead, they will be redirected to a waiting page with a timer, showing your ads, after the timer is done, people will see a button informing them that they are good to go with the external link
